---
title: "HTW Project"
toc: true
toc-location: left
#title-block-banner: false
comments: false
date-format: 'MMM YYYY'
format:
  html:
    grid:
      sidebar-width: 250px
      body-width: 1400px
      margin-width: 170px
      gutter-width: 1.5rem
    self-contained: false
listing:
 - id: Modeling
   type: grid
   filter-ui: [date, title, categories]
   sort-ui: [date, title, categories]

 - id: Simulations
   type: grid
   grid-columns: 3
   #max-items: 6
   page-size: 6
   grid-item-border: true
   sort-ui: false
   filter-ui: false
   categories: true
   include:
     categories: "Simulation*"
   exclude:
     categories: "{Shiny*,Interactive,OJS}"
     filename: "*.md*"
 - id: Analyses
   type: grid
   filter-ui: [date, title, categories]
   sort-ui: [date, title, categories]
   include:
     categories: "{*Analysis*}"
 - id: Misc
   type: grid
   sort-ui: [date, title, categories]
   include:
     categories: "{Task,Interactive,Shiny,js,OJS, Visualization}*"
---
